name: Color Jump - Endless Arcade Game
description:
Color Jump is here!

Tap to jump through matching colors.
Follow the color pattern on each obstacle to cross it!

____________________________________________

• Simple one-tap gameplay
• 150 different levels
• Endless mode
____________________________________________

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!
